content: A federal judge in Florida has ruled that a Darden Restaurants Inc subsidiary wrongly destroyed emails  job applications and records of job interviews during an age bias investigation by the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission.
name: Darden Restaurants Inc
title: Judge sanctions Darden unit for spoiling evidence during EEOC probe

content: LOS ANGELES Olive Garden parent Darden Restaurants Inc  said on Tuesday it expects the negative effects on sales and earnings per share from Hurricane Irma to be about double that of Hurricane Harvey.
name: Darden Restaurants Inc
title: Darden expects business hit from Hurricane Irma to double Harvey's

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  March 28 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed the Long-Term Issuer  Default Rating (IDR) of Darden Restaurants  Inc. at 'BBB' and the Short-Term IDR  at 'F2' following the company's definitive agreement to acquire Cheddar's  Scratch Kitchen (Cheddar's) for $780 million. The Rating Outlook is Stable. A  full list of rating actions follows at the end of this release.  Cheddar's is a regional casual dining restaurant chain with 165
name: Darden Restaurants Inc
title: Fitch Affirms Darden's IDRS at 'BBB/F2'; Outlook Stable

content: LOS ANGELES  March 20 * Darden Restaurants Inc  exploring options for real estate  including sale and leaseback deals * Darden says has secured letters of intent or contracts on the majority of 31 listed properties at cap rates well below 6 percent * Darden has listed its Orlando  Florida  headquarters  options include sale and leaseback * Darden says real estate proceeds will be used to repay debt and improve credit profile * Darden says has identified $90-$100 mln of potential cost
